website_summaries.verdict: Many were pleased that Reebok created a CrossFit shoe with a woman’s foot in mind. The CrossFit Grace was praised not only for being very comfortable, but also because it was an overall great training shoe for dynamic movements, squats, and weightlifting. However, some found the shoe’s durability questionable. But in the end, it still came highly recommended for its comfort and functionality.
pros: The Reebok CrossFit Grace received praise for its comfortable build from a majority of owners
A myriad of consumers stated that it was flexible for most CrossFit movements and stable enough for squats and lifts
Numerous gym buffs appreciated the breathability of the shoe
The grippy sole was a welcome feature for many CrossFit enthusiasts
Most buyers gave high marks to the style of the shoe
cons: A minority of individuals were not pleased that the shoe fell apart after only a few months of use
Several people griped that the inside lining made their foot slide forward
A few folks complained that it lacked toe box protection

customer_reviews.title: Nice support, be careful of added ankle fabric in back.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you go up 1/2 size in these shoe. I liked what seemed like a wider toe box, but they did something odd with the back of the shoe with some type of 'liner.' My ankles did not like the rubbing, so I returned these before even trying them at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Musetta

customer_reviews.title: Design NOT RIght
customer_reviews.text: At first try on this is a nice shoe. Firm support but not tight - but once you walk in them they are horrible. No cushion or arch support at all. Heel slides up and down no matter how tight you tie the shoes. The sizing was correct for the length of my foot, and the width seemed correct. There is just a design flaw here. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JStaR

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: Without my inserts in the shoes they felt extremely flat and unsupportive. With the inserts they seemed to jut my foot forward into the toes while leaving space at the back. They just did not seem to be made to fit a foot. I guess if you had feet without any issues and just wanted something to cover your feet these might work. The fabric did not seem like fabric at all; was rather papery feeling instead of a nice mesh of many athletic shoes available. I can't imagine them wearing well at all. Value way below cost!
customer_reviews.author: Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely difficult for me to find shoes that fit well. I have very high arches and multiple sclerosis. So I need something for high arches, with support, good grip and very light weight. These shoes offer all of that and they’re super cute
customer_reviews.author: Glynda B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I have the nano 7 that I bought for crossfit. One of the coaches recommended this one, since I am having so many issues w tendonitis etc, because the sole is not as hard. I have nothing bad to say about them. Not my favorite. But it is true that the sole is not as hard.
customer_reviews.author: Anatole

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these wondering if they were the right choice, i have always used asics and resently nike but these are great! Love the color, the style, the looks and how they feel! I bought my normal 8 size and it was perfect, taught a zumba class felt nice and then my normal gym clases and they are soft but good support for your feet. I would totally recomend them, the only thing is that they are a bit clear color towards the front so easy to get dirty but just a color thing!
customer_reviews.author: zabrina

customer_reviews.title: All around sneaker with a medium to narrow fit.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Reebok’s Nano Collection this cross trainer seems to be a nice hybrid of walking and gym sneaker. Good traction and support for road to gym terrain. Toe box is like any average sneaker. Fit true to size for me as a medium 8.5. I would say this sneaker hugs your foot and would likely be best for someone with a narrow to medium foot look for a walking training sneaker with just enough support.
customer_reviews.author: Mach

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected except maybe the toe box was a bit wider then normal but besides that perfect. I don’t like buying shoes online but I know I can always count on Reebok CrossFit sneakers. I wear them for lifting and HIIT training. I ran in them once by accident 4.5 miles and they did better then expected but they were not meant for long runs.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: I likey
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Reebok CrossFit shoes. These are way better than my first pair but they do seem a little big so size down a half size. Love the color - get lots of compliments but they get really dirty from the black mats at our box and not real easy to clean. Still I’d buy them again - they are comfy and I could run in them for our WOD with a run.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes yet!
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly complimented on these shoes. They are comfortable too. We recently took a family trip to Disneyland and I wore these all day for four days straight. My feet NEVER hurt the whole trip. I was shocked. I do wear these to train (lift weights) as well. I would have to say that these are one of my favorite pair of shoes for training and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: B. FOX

customer_reviews.title: T25 approved
customer_reviews.text: Needed shoes with a little more support for my foray into doing T25. These have helped a great deal with arch pain I was dealing with from using more cardio based shoes. They do squeak a little on some of the jumping things, but I'm on the living room floor, so it's to be expected. I ordered my regular size and they fit perfectly, no reason to size up like for running shoes. And they don't look nerdy.
customer_reviews.author: LKodat

customer_reviews.title: More stability lifting than running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for working out! I lift and was looking for something to up my game and these did it! I’m happy I happy I went with the CrossFit’s. They took about a week to break in, but that’s because I was used to lifting in running shoes. I’m so glad I finally made the switch!!
customer_reviews.author: MountainMommy

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this shoe but would need a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this shoe but would need a 1/2 size smaller. It is pretty narrow overall but the toe box is a bit wider. Fits very different that the nano4/5
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of these before and loved them. Nice roomy toe box. I have High arches to I add arch cookies. I use them for everyday and work out shoes. Love them. Wish they didn’t discontinue this style. Didn’t get them for the color I prefer Black, but I get a lot of compliment on them.
customer_reviews.author: kelltell

customer_reviews.title: My fave leg day shoes
customer_reviews.text: I didnt know i needed this until i wore it to train. I hAD SO MUCH more balance. I usually wear any sneakers to train and sometimes i would wobble when lifting etc especially in the foam type running shoes. This is my new favourite for leg days. My training has gone to another level
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and light
customer_reviews.text: A little big but not sure if I picked the wrong size since it's been 5 years since I bought a pair of crossfits. They are light, comfy and the front fold very well when doing some yoga moves or fast lunges. Reebok is always my favorite crossfit shoes but, I haven't really tried any others.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile and worth it for crossfit
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors and how versatile the shoes are in the gym. I occasionally get some aching in my feet if I do a lot of jumping and I wear other shoes for running usually, but I have inserts in a lot of my running shoes. I love being able to do all my inside crossfit workouts with one pair of fun shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jen N

customer_reviews.title: Fit & comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I have a: *Wide foot *High arch *High instep *Size 7
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but didn't seem sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These were super cute and I was excited to get them but, the toe box is really flimsy. So if you're a cross-fitter you know how beat up they can get. I returned them and grabbed the Nano 8 which I really love.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Funky
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well. They are gorgeous. I love the color! Unfortunately, they retain odor something horrible. I bought them to work out in, right? Well, I sweat because I work hard. I have had to soak these things in bleach, and leave them on the back porch. Sprinkling them with baking soda helps, but jeez. They smell worse than my running shoes that I have put over 1,000 miles in!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda F. S El

customer_reviews.title: These shoes don't breath well!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I think these are nice shoes. They run large, so I would order half a size smaller than normal. I ordered a 7 originally and had to return for 6.5. I did one workout in both sizes and both times my feet like they were fire. I haven't read a review similar to my problem, so it could just be my preference. Again, the overall shoe is nice and I really liked how they fit but I couldn't handle how hot my feet felt so ultimately I returned them and went another direction.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice workout shoes. I like the light color but they do get dirty easily. I’ve used this few a lot of workouts, mixed training including short runs and they are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for gym activities. They offer grip and stability with weights and aerobic type crossfx workouts. I do wear something else for lots of running though. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Shane and Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected. I typically buy Nike and this was to large for my feet even after reading the reviews. Not so large that I can’t wear them but my feet slide in them when running/pushing/pulling and they rubbed my left heel raw.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: They were a tiny bit too big. Just a little but they felt comfortable. I had to run with them at one point during my WOD and they felt a bit uncomfortable at times by my little toe area.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe! I’ve had trouble with shoes rubbing blisters on the back of my heels when running and these do not! They are beautiful in color!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Adidas, but I really like this Reebok and would definitely purchase it again. It's super comfortable, very light and good quality. My feet are on the narrow side, and these shoes are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Sent me two right shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’d love to give a review based on how they functioned during a WOD, however I received two right shoes and have since decided it would be a bad idea to shove my left foot into one of them. Sorry for your luck... I’m sure it’s an awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! I highly recommend them for any athlete who does boot camp, HITT, and Crossfit. I used them for crossfit however, I do crossfit 5 days/week so if you are using them this much, expect for them to last you about 6-7 months. I used them to the fullest! They were great for box jumps, easy on your feet. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and functional
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. When I lift, my feet are even and the shoe is flexible. I like the inside arc for rope climbs. I can run in them no problem and I have a wide foot. They exclusively my Crossfit shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Monroy

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these in my CrossFit classes for the past two weeks and so far so good! Really happy with them and they were a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for lifting
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes. I wouldn't recommend for running but they are perfect for a HIIT workout such as Runtastic or weightlifting.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Recommend half sizing down, great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. I normally wear brooks, but was having bad leg pain from the gym... I switched to these because they’re flatter & oh boy they have made a difference! I definitely wish I would have ordered an 8.5 rather than a 9, but I’m making due with them as they are. They’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs half a size large
customer_reviews.text: Reebok crossfit tend to run a half size big on me, other than that, this is my most favorite training shoe. Balanced, conforming, and padded all at the same time. Great for lifting, running, and everything in between.
customer_reviews.author: J Todd

customer_reviews.title: Cross training
customer_reviews.text: I use these for cross training and absolutely love them. If your workout has a lot of running in it i would not suggest these. Lifting, kettle bell training, and add in some cardio...perfect!
customer_reviews.author: penny harris

customer_reviews.title: Good CrossFit shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They’re cute and work perfectly for my CrossFit workouts. Comfy and the shoe laces don’t come untied easily.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Kidder

customer_reviews.title: If only I had narrow feet...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking shoe. Just a little too narrow in the toe area. I felt my pinky toe rubbing just a bit. If it hadn't been for that, I definitely would've kept them!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light weight shoe. I also love that it comes up higher on the back of the ankle. This prevents rubbing and blisters on the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: milo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely narrow & customers  pay for returns
customer_reviews.text: These are a stylish shoe as many have said, but do not expect them to fit like other Reebok shoes, like with all Reebok’s a 1/2 size down length wise is a perfect fit, but the toe box on these is extremely narrow. I had to return these and get the Nanos instead. The most disappointing part is this seller makes you pay for your returns, over $14 in my case, for shoes that didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Grace A. Dalman

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! So glad I didn’t listen to the reviews and order down a half size because ordering my normal size fit perfect. Feel like I have a lot more stability with these during boot camp and CrossFit then my old trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Tld421

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. bought them because i do a lot of weight lifting and cross training exercises. They are snug and roomy all at the same time. Love how they look on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: KCL110417

customer_reviews.title: 😍
customer_reviews.text: Use daily for working out either Cross fit, yoga, or running they feel great
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and are such a good price for getting started in CrossFit! I have improved so much since getting these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Great boot camp shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a shoe that actually makes a difference when working out inside. I am very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom-Atty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit just right, look amazing, and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TMY

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes. Super comfortable, didn't have to "break" them in.
customer_reviews.author: nicki

customer_reviews.title: comfortable yet
customer_reviews.text: comfortable shoes, yet, not for the elliptical. I would not recommend these for the elliptical.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Self

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and they are pretty comfortable. I do wish the insoles had more cushion for when we run in Crossfit.
customer_reviews.author: JRevereL

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I work out 5 days a week and they hold up to all my activities. Steady while lifting but I also use for my cardio classes. Excellent shoes at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Linville

customer_reviews.title: All around great workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. I bought my first pair over a year ago for CrossFit and I rarely wear any other shoes. Great for anything in the gym and this pair is actually more grippy which helps with lifting. I recommend this shoe all the time! Loved this color too with the gum sole accent.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Check the description before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the shoes shows a pair that are perhaps "tarheel" blue and navy. Big surprise when I opened the box and found a pair of black and white sneakers. Then I went back to the ad and read where it describes them as black and white. Not at all like the picture or what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Davis

customer_reviews.title: Feel great and laces stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these shoes and they are pretty comfortable. They feel a little small to get on but after moving in them they feel like they fit well to my feet and I have ran and lifted in them now.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Large toebox
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked great, but the second I put them on I knew I would return them. Toe box is way too big. Didn't try sizing down because the length was fine and, I figured I'd still have fit issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jayd Steidl

customer_reviews.title: I actually have 2 pair like this. LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: I actually have 2 pair like this. LOVE them!! They fit perfect (run a tad bit small) and I love working out in them.
customer_reviews.author: natasha fontenot

customer_reviews.title: Love the way they look
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these shoes look and fit! I have had them for a little over a month, but today when I put them on, the back fabric grip thing ripped! The return window has passed. I will be calling Amazon to see what can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ward

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a size 7 womens and these In size 7 are just too big. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great work out shoe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They are extremely comfortable and perfect to wear when I’m lifting at the gym. It’s not bulky or heavy either and the fit is not as narrow as you’d expect. I’m almost tempted to buy two just because I like it that much I want a spare!
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Aguero

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bodypump/ Strength workouts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Bodypump, (I'm an instructor), or any strength or HIIT/ CrossFit workout. Good grip on the soles for all those lunges. Fit is like my other athletic shoes (Saucony brand). Not for running or endurance cardio, though.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Keep you from going onto your toes. Comfortable and good for running as well as lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Nothappyinwv

customer_reviews.title: Great for CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, lightweight shoes. I’ve been wearing them to a CrossFit class and makes all the difference in how my feet feel afterwards and all through the day.
customer_reviews.author: CJane33

customer_reviews.title: Color was off but I still like them
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They are cute and comfortable and i would have given five stars but the color doesn't exactly match the picture. Its close and i do still like them but in the picture they look brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: When the shoes arrived I was worried they would be too narrow for my feet. But when I put them on it was a perfect fit! I love how they feel. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: CGunn

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Solid sole that holds up to all the rigors of a CrossFit workout. The rise on the side is a little higher than most of my shoes, hits right at my ankle bone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Weight lifting shoes and cardio
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes especially for weight lifting. I noticed I can run on treadmill and I dont have pain in knees or legs. I cant find these exact shoes or color anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Woolbright

customer_reviews.title: Good, supportive cross-training shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for over a month now and I really like that way these shoes feel supportive while also allowing my feet to move in different ways for different workouts. I use them for strength training and kickboxing, and think they will wear well, as they seem to be pretty heavy-duty compared to some shoes I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good but large
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes but run a half to whole size bigger so size down
customer_reviews.author: L. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Lifting shoe
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a lifting shoe. Tough bottom, no arch support. Do not buy for running. Provides good base for lifting. Good quality. Way less expensive on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: So far they’re perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Good room in toe box. Neutral heel height is perfect for balance while lifting weights.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coolidge

customer_reviews.title: The best training shoes
customer_reviews.text: My first Reebok sneakers ever. And i am pleasantly surprised. The best training shoe. Fits great, feels great, looks great, ........buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Filipova

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great light comfortable shoe! I do order a size down when ordering my crossfit shoes because they do fit on the larger size but fit exactly how I expected!
customer_reviews.author: BestBooks

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe but am normally 8.5 but when it arrived it’s too big. So will order 8 and will see how that goes. I wore the shoes to the store and back. Loved everything, but size.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I normally wear a 9.5-10 in other athletic shoes. Bought a 9.5 and it fits perfectly. Would but again in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: G. Krista Myers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am a true 6 1/2 in every shoe I wear except these shoes. They run a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Little

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are good for CrossFit but definitely not good for running or even walking around town. Only made to be worn for short periods of time but overall they are good shoes
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I've been looking for a shoe to exercise with that wouldn't hurt since I have very flat feet. These are perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, comfy and they fit perfect. Will buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainer. Spacious toe box. I need one in every color.
customer_reviews.author: Trainer Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes!!! They are super comfortable!! I do CrossFit 5 days a week and have no complaints about this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Like the extra ankle grip
customer_reviews.text: Like the extra ankle grip. If your foot is thin (top to bottom), there s some place in the toe area. A more pointed toe box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves the shoes wouldn’t recommend seller
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my wife and we received today and looked to be used. Sides we marred with dirt and bottom was dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Russell White

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for price!
customer_reviews.text: I orders a half size smaller than what I normally wear and they fit perfect. Perfect for light running and lifting
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: I expected them to be a happy pink but they were drab
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very cute, I was didappointed in the color. I expected them to be a happy pink but they were drab. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes and great for my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Schmoll

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the crossfit shoe from Reebok. Good support for my heavy lift days and don't hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Crossfit
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Great price and speedy shipping. Very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: darcy fagundes

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit was spot on. Great colors and my fiancé loved them
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers! Perfect for lifting and met-con work outs. I feel very connected to the ground in them and stable in my stance. Heel drop is perfect and not too low or too high. Mid sole is fitted and snug(as it should be) with plenty of toe box room. I have average width feet and they're perfect and true size I wear and 9.5 in all sneakers and these are no different.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jeans shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and look great. The navy blue pair look great with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Hepner

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: You wanna shoe that fits these are the best ones to get! I have 2 pairs of these shoes and plan to buy them every time I need a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lowney

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for CrossFit workouts. Love the fit & love working out in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for weight lifting and cardio workouts. I tend to have a wider foot and these fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Claire wassall

customer_reviews.title: They feel good.
customer_reviews.text: I like how light weight they are & good grip when running for crossfit.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Great for lifting
customer_reviews.text: Love the ankle support cushion and how light weight these are to lift in. I wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I feel very comfortable in the shoes, and especially when lifting heavy weights. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Drake McNorton

customer_reviews.title: They fit true to size!
customer_reviews.text: The color!! I love these for CrossFit!! They work well when I’m doing rope climbs
customer_reviews.author: leeann leaks

customer_reviews.title: It's supposed to have a big toe box!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size, and you will have a large toe box. It's actually quite nice!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: ... been wearing these during my crossfit workouts and I love them. They are ok for short runs but ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these during my crossfit workouts and I love them. They are ok for short runs but I wouldn't wear them for long distance running. I wear a 8.5 in almost all of the shoes I buy and I read to order a size smaller so I bought an 8 and they fit perfect. I love them for rope climbs because they have side grips. Over all I really like the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel amazing and they give me an awesome grip on my stance while weightlifting!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am using these shoes at the gym for Tabata and Kettlebell Amp'd. They work very well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Parsell

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Lite weight
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Lite weight. Snug around top of food. Fit perfect...true to my size of 7.5/ 8 I ordered an 8 ....fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ABC

product_meta.title: Reebok Women's Crossfit Grace Tr Track Shoe
product_meta.description: Change the game on CrossFit with the new Reebok grace. The multi-surface outsole takes on rope climbs and burpees with ease. The external heel counter creates a stable feel for lifting. Updated tooling and nanoweave upper speak true CrossFit style.
feature_bullets: Best for: CrossFit, gym workouts, lifting
Low cut design for freedom of motion and quicker transitions
Rubber outsole designed for durability and traction
Toe Tection provides durability in the toe area for high intensity workouts
